content.question: The Lewis electron-dot diagram for <math alttext="C 4 H 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is shown above. Which of the following is the predominant type of intermolecular force among <math alttext="C 4 H 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> molecules?

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
